why_choose_us.title: Why Choose Us
why_choose_us.description: At Quik Rent a Car, we strive to make your car rental experience seamless, affordable, and exceptional, no matter where your travels take you.
why_choose_us.card_1_description: We offer unbeatable rates on car rentals, ensuring you get the best value for your money. Our Best Price Guarantee means you can book with confidence, knowing you’re getting the most competitive prices on the market, without hidden fees or surprises.
why_choose_us.card_2_description: Our user-friendly platform allows you to book your car in just a few clicks. Whether you're planning a spontaneous trip or a well-organized getaway, booking your perfect vehicle is fast, simple, and hassle-free.
why_choose_us.card_3_description: We believe in providing exceptional support, whenever you need it. Our dedicated customer service team is available 24/7 to assist you with any questions or concerns, ensuring a smooth and stress-free rental experience from start to finish.

freqently_asked_questions.title: Frequently Asked Questions
freqently_asked_questions.description: Quick Answers to Common Questions – Ensuring a Hassle-Free Car Rental Experience
freqently_asked_questions.q1: How do I make a booking with Quik Rent a Car?
freqently_asked_questions.q1_answer: To book a car, simply visit our website, select your pick-up and drop-off locations, choose your rental dates, and browse our available vehicles. Once you’ve selected a car, follow the easy steps to complete your reservation. You can pay securely online or choose to pay at the counter upon arrival.
freqently_asked_questions.q2: What is included in the rental price?
freqently_asked_questions.q2_answer: Our rental prices generally include basic insurance, unlimited mileage (unless stated otherwise), and 24/7 roadside assistance. Optional extras such as GPS, child seats, and additional insurance can be added during the booking process for an extra charge.
freqently_asked_questions.q3: What documents do I need to rent a car?

q3_answer.title: To rent a car with us, you will need:
q3_answer.subtitle1: A valid driver's license held for at least 1 year (2 years in some cases).
q3_answer.subtitle3: A valid credit card in the renter's name for the security deposit. (International drivers may need an International Driving Permit, depending on the country.)

freqently_asked_questions.q4: Can I modify or cancel my reservation?
freqently_asked_questions.q4_answer: Yes, you can modify or cancel your booking up to 48 hours before your pick-up time without penalty, depending on the terms of your booking. Please refer to your booking confirmation for specific cancellation policies, as some bookings may have different terms.
freqently_asked_questions.q5: What is the minimum age to rent a car?
freqently_asked_questions.q5_answer: The minimum age to rent a car with Quik Rent a Car is 21 years old. Drivers under 25 may be subject to an additional young driver surcharge. Specific age requirements may vary by car type or location.
freqently_asked_questions.q6: Can I rent a car if I’m under 25?
freqently_asked_questions.q6_answer: Yes, we offer rentals to drivers under 25, but additional fees may apply. The exact surcharge depends on the car category and location. Please check the terms when making your reservation.
freqently_asked_questions.q7: Can I rent a car with a debit card?
freqently_asked_questions.q7_answer: In most cases, we require a credit card for the security deposit and booking. However, certain locations may allow you to rent with a debit card if additional verification or documentation is provided. Please contact our customer support team to confirm if this option is available at your chosen location.
freqently_asked_questions.q8: Do I need to return the car with a full tank of fuel?
freqently_asked_questions.q8_answer: Yes, we ask that you return the car with a full tank of fuel, just as you received it. If the car is returned with less fuel, you will be charged for refueling at an additional cost, which may include a refueling fee.
freqently_asked_questions.q9: Can I rent a car and drive it outside the country?
freqently_asked_questions.q9_answer: In some cases, it may be possible to rent a car and drive it across borders, depending on the rental location and the car type. There may be restrictions and extra charges for international travel. Please check with us in advance if you plan to drive the rental car outside the country.
freqently_asked_questions.q10: What should I do if the car breaks down or I am involved in an accident?
freqently_asked_questions.q10_answer: If you experience any issues with the vehicle or are involved in an accident, please contact our 24/7 roadside assistance service immediately. We will guide you through the next steps. You will also need to file a police report in the case of an accident and provide us with the details.
freqently_asked_questions.q11: Do I need insurance when renting a car?
freqently_asked_questions.q11_answer: Basic insurance is usually included in the rental price, but we highly recommend that you consider additional coverage for peace of mind. You can add extra insurance options, such as Collision Damage Waiver (CDW) or Theft Protection, during the booking process or at the rental location.
freqently_asked_questions.q12: Can I add an additional driver to my rental?
freqently_asked_questions.q12_answer: Yes, additional drivers can be added for a small extra fee. Both the primary and additional drivers must meet our rental criteria, such as being over the minimum age and holding a valid driver’s license.
freqently_asked_questions.q13: What types of cars are available for rent?
freqently_asked_questions.q13_answer: We offer a wide range of vehicles, from economy cars to luxury cars, SUVs, and vans. Our fleet includes vehicles to suit various needs and budgets. You can view the available options during the booking process based on your preferences and travel dates.
freqently_asked_questions.q14: Are there any hidden fees I should be aware of?
freqently_asked_questions.q14_answer: We aim to be transparent with our pricing. The rental price you see at the time of booking is the amount you will pay, plus any optional extras you choose (such as GPS, child seats, or insurance upgrades). Additional fees may apply for services like late returns, one-way rentals, or additional drivers, and will be clearly stated during the booking process.
freqently_asked_questions.q15: What happens if I return the car late?
freqently_asked_questions.q15_answer: Late returns are subject to additional charges. If you anticipate being late, please contact us in advance. Late fees will be charged for each hour or day the car is overdue. Be sure to return the vehicle on time to avoid unnecessary charges.
freqently_asked_questions.q16_answer: Yes, we offer one-way rentals, where you can pick up the car at one location and drop it off at another. One-way fees may apply depending on the rental locations and availability of vehicles for return.
freqently_asked_questions.q17_answer: Most of our rental cars come with unlimited mileage, but please check the specific terms of your rental agreement as some vehicles or locations may have mileage limits. Excess mileage charges will apply if you exceed the limit.
freqently_asked_questions.q18: How can I contact customer support?
freqently_asked_questions.q18_answer: You can reach our customer support team via phone, email, or through the live chat feature on our website. Our team is available 24/7 to assist you with any questions or issues.
freqently_asked_questions.q19: Can I rent a car for just one day?
freqently_asked_questions.q19_answer: Yes, you can rent a car for as short as one day, depending on availability. Simply enter your pick-up and drop-off dates to check for availability and prices.
freqently_asked_questions.q20: What should I do if I lose my keys or documents?
freqently_asked_questions.q20_answer: If you lose your car keys or any rental documents, please contact our customer service team immediately. We can assist with arranging a replacement or providing additional guidance on how to proceed.
